name_abbreviation: Oliver v. Commonwealth, Department of Transportation

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The case is dismissed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Harold H. Cramer, Asst. Counsel, Harrisburg, for appellee.

Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
